!Master Ixia: I need *10* of *Medusa Blood, Marsh Spider Fluids, Dead Seeker Dung, Paagrio Crusader's Blood, and Nightshade Root* each. Dead Seeker bat can be found in the execution ground of Dion, and Paagrio Crusader is in the Wastelands of Gludio. And the Nightshade Root can be obtained from the stakatos of Cruma Marshlands.
